title: Don't Knock Twice 2017
description:
Don't Knock Twice


Graduation year: 2017
Genre: Adventure, First-person, 3D, Horror
Developer: Wales Interactive
Publisher: Wales Interactive
Platform: PC
Publication type: Informal
Interface language: Russian, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese (SIMP.), Polish
Language: English
Medicine: Present

System requirements:
OS: Windows 7 (64 bit!)
CPU: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 and better
Memory: 4 GB
Video: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 or better
DirectX: 11
Disk space: 2 GB

Description:
 Don't Knock Twice (Not double tap) — the game-horror first-person, based on the urban legend from which the blood was congealed and petrified consciousness. To save his abandoned daughter, and tormented by the guilt the mother must reveal a terrible truth urban legend about a vengeful demon witch. Banging again and awaken her from sleep, knocks twice, the dead will rise from it.

Explore the Grand manor house where you can interact with almost every visible object. To find and rescue his daughter, you'll go into a creepy mansion, finding hidden clues, and using different objects to fight or escape from the surrounding nightmare.

The game is based on the film Don't Knock Twice (Not double tap) directed by Caradog James (the Machine) with Katy Sackhoff (Battlestar Galactica) in the lead role.

The game supports the latest virtual reality systems, which provides absolutely exciting. In addition, a complete version of the game in normal mode without the use of virtual reality systems
